Issue.creator: guoger
Issue.summary: Consolidate Long Eventual Timeout in chaincode-evm integration tests
Issue.description: In {{fabric-chaincode-evm}} integration tests, sometimes we wait a long time for certain executions to finish. The timeout currently ranges from several seconds to several minutes. If we are certain that an execution is going to take long, and we definitely need to wait for a successful outcome, we could simply consolidate them to a fixed {{LongEventualTimeout}}.
